briefdescription.para: The output directory where the data will be saved.
The number of realizations for which data will be collected.
A 2D vector of DataCollector objects that store the data collected for all water sources in across all realizations.
A 2D vector of DataCollector objects that store the data collected for all drought mitigation policies in across all realizations.
A 2D vector of UtilitiesDataCollector objects that store the data collected for all utilities in across all realizations.
A vector of the IDs of realizations that have crashed.
A vector of the IDs of realizations that have been successfully run.
The number of realizations that have been created.
The seed used for the random number generator.
Constructs a MasterDataCollector to manage and collect data across multiple realizations. Initializes the number of realizations and the list of realizations to run.

parameterdescription.para: A reference to a vector of unsigned long integers representing the realizations to be run.

briefdescription.para: Destroys the MasterDataCollector, cleaning up all dynamically allocated DataCollector and UtilitiesDataCollector objects.
Writes utility data collected during the simulation into a NetCDF file. The data includes variables such as storage, risk of failure, demands, and payments for each utility across all realizations.

detaileddescription.para: FIXME: NetCDF file being saved with hardly any compression. Someone who knows more about NetCDF may be able to improve compression, which would be great given the amount of output that can be generated in one run.

parameterdescription.para: The base name for the NetCDF file to be created.

simplesect.para:
An integer representing the status of the operation:
0 if the file is successfully written.
NC_ERR if an error occurs during the NetCDF operations.
1 if NetCDF is not enabled in this build.

parameterdescription.para: If a NetCDF operation fails, an exception is thrown with error details.

briefdescription.para: Prints the output of drought mitigation policies in a compact CSV format for a specified time range. This function generates separate CSV files for each realization.

parameterdescription.para: Integer representing the starting week of the time range.
Integer representing the ending week of the time range.
String specifying the base name for the output files.

briefdescription.para: Prints the output of drought mitigation policies in a tabular format for a specified time range. This function generates separate .tab files for each realization.

parameterdescription.para: Integer representing the starting week of the time range.
Integer representing the ending week of the time range.
String specifying the base name for the output files.

briefdescription.para: Prints the output of utility data in a compact CSV format for a specified time range. This function generates separate CSV files for each realization.

parameterdescription.para: Integer representing the starting week of the time range.
Integer representing the ending week of the time range.
String specifying the base name for the output files.

briefdescription.para: Prints the output of utility data in a tabular format for a specified time range. This function generates separate .tab files for each realization.

parameterdescription.para: Integer representing the starting week of the time range.
Integer representing the ending week of the time range.
String specifying the base name for the output files.

briefdescription.para: Prints the output of water source data in a compact CSV format for a specified time range. This function generates separate CSV files for each realization.

parameterdescription.para: Integer representing the starting week of the time range.
Integer representing the ending week of the time range.
String specifying the base name for the output files.
warning is printed and the specific realization's data is skipped.

briefdescription.para: Prints the output of water source data in a tabular format for a specified time range. This function generates separate .tab files for each realization.

parameterdescription.para: Integer representing the starting week of the time range.
Integer representing the ending week of the time range.
String specifying the base name for the output files.

briefdescription.para: Sets the output directory for storing generated output files. If the specified directory differs from the current one, it creates the directory and updates the output location.

parameterdescription.para: String representing the base directory for output files.
String specifying the sub-directory to append to the base directory.

briefdescription.para: Prints the infrastructure pathways for each utility and realization into an output file. The output includes a text file with tab-separate columns showing data on the realization ID, utility ID, week, and infrastructure ID.

parameterdescription.para: String specifying the base name for the output file.

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< WaterSource *> water_sources_realization, vector< DroughtMitigationPolicy *> drought_mitigation_policies_realization, vector< Utility *> utilities_realization, unsigned long r)
memberdef.name: addRealization

briefdescription.para: Adds data collectors for a new realization, initializing data structures and creating collectors for water sources, drought mitigation policies, and utilities.

parameterdescription.para: Vector of pointers to WaterSource objects for the realization.
Vector of pointers to DroughtMitigationPolicy objects for the realization.
Vector of pointers to Utility objects for the realization.
Unsigned long integer representing the realization ID.

briefdescription.para: Removes a specified realization, deallocating associated data collectors and updating tracking structures.

parameterdescription.para: Unsigned long integer representing the realization ID to be removed.

briefdescription.para: Cleans up data collector vectors by removing entries corresponding to deleted realizations. This ensures that no nullptr entries remain in the data collector structures.
Collects data for a specified realization r by invoking the collect_data method on all associated data collectors.

parameterdescription.para: Unsigned long integer representing the realization ID for which data will be collected.

memberdef.argsstring: (int sol_id, int n_sets, int n_samples, int n_threads, vector< vector< int >> bootstrap_samples=vector< vector< int >>())
memberdef.name: performBootstrapAnalysis

briefdescription.para: Performs a bootstrap analysis to generate statistical samples for objectives based on multiple sets of realizations.

parameterdescription.para: Integer representing the solution ID for which the bootstrap analysis is conducted.
Integer specifying the number of bootstrap sample sets to generate.
Integer specifying the number of samples per bootstrap set.
Integer representing the number of threads to use for parallelization.
Vector of vectors containing pre-defined bootstrap samples, if available. Otherwise, new samples will be generated.

briefdescription.para: Creates and returns a data collector for a specified drought mitigation policy based on its type.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the DroughtMitigationPolicy object for which a data collector is to be created.
Unsigned long integer representing the realization ID.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the newly created DataCollector object corresponding to the given policy.

parameterdescription.para: If the policy type is not recognized or not handled in the implementation.

briefdescription.para: Creates and returns a data collector for a specified water source based on its type.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WaterSource object for which a data collector is to be created.
Unsigned long integer representing the realization ID.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the newly created DataCollector object corresponding to the given water source.

parameterdescription.para: If the water source type is not recognized or not handled in the implementation.

briefdescription.para: Calculates and writes utility objectives to a row in an output stream and appends the results to the objectives vector.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to a vector of UtilitiesDataCollector * representing the utility data collectors for the realization.
Reference to the std::ofstream where the objectives will be written.
Reference to a vector of doubles where the calculated objectives will be appended.

memberdef.argsstring: (int sol_id, int n_sets, int n_samples, const vector< vector< int >> &bootstrap_samples, vector< vector< int >> &bootstrap_sample_sets) const
memberdef.name: readOrCreateBSSamples

briefdescription.para: Performs a bootstrap analysis to compute statistical objectives based on multiple sets of realizations and writes results to output files.

parameterdescription.para: Integer representing the solution ID for which the bootstrap analysis is conducted.
Integer specifying the number of bootstrap sample sets to generate.
Integer specifying the number of samples per bootstrap set.
Integer representing the number of threads to use for parallelization.
Vector of vectors containing pre-defined bootstrap samples. If empty, new samples will be generated.

memberdef.argsstring: (int sol_id, int n_sets, int n_samples, vector< vector< double >> &objectives)
memberdef.name: printObjsBSSamples

briefdescription.para: Prints the calculated objectives for bootstrap samples to a CSV file. Each row represents the objectives for a specific bootstrap set.

parameterdescription.para: Integer representing the solution ID for which the objectives are being printed.
Integer specifying the number of bootstrap sample sets.
Integer specifying the number of samples per bootstrap set.
Reference to a vector of vectors containing the calculated objectives for each bootstrap set.

memberdef.argsstring: (int sol_id, int n_sets, int n_samples, const vector< vector< int >> &bootstrap_sample_sets) const
memberdef.name: printBSSamples

briefdescription.para: The MasterDataCollector class implements the data collection of all WaterSource, Utility, and Bond objects across multiple hydroclimatic realizations.
